### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Configurations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    config_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Settings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INTEGER REFERENCES Configurations(id),
    setting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    setting_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Configurations SET app_name = 'Updated App 1' WHERE id = 1

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Configurations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    config_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Settings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INTEGER REFERENCES Configurations(id),
    setting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    setting_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Settings SET setting_value = 'New Value' WHERE app_id = 1 AND setting_name = 'Setting 1'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Configurations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    config_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Settings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    app_id INTEGER REFERENCES Configurations(id),
    setting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    setting_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Configurations SET config_data = config_data || '{"new_key": "new_value"}' WHERE id = 2
